nodes.text: This probe droid was stationed on the Separatist planet Lola Sayu in the Citadel prison around 21 BBY at the time of the Battle of Lola Sayu.

After the elite team of clone troopers led by Jedi Generals Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker arrived at the Citadel—in order to rescue Jedi Master Even Piell who was being held there for interrogation—they split up into two teams. The team, lead by Anakin Skywalker, began walking through a series of cavers to reach a fuel line, but the probe droid found the squad and began following them. The droid was destroyed by Skywalker shortly afterwards.
